data.text:
@GailGailGailABC An MP's Salary is £81,000.
A £2,200 pay rise is 2.7%.
Remind me again how much the NHS, Police, pay rises are.
How much the lowest paid will “benefit” from in pay rises this year.
Leading from the front ( to the piggy trough ) again.
Have they no social awareness at all ?
@GailGailGailABC Nothing surprises me anymore with this atrocious government 😡
@GailGailGailABC The announcement no doubt timed to when the least people will be looking.
